categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Touler served the Galactic Empire as Fleet Commander in the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. Touler was present during the Assault on Kamino, an attempt by the Rebel Alliance to take out the cloning facilities of the planet Kamino, in 1 BBY. When Rebel starships entered the Kamino system, the Sith Lord Darth Vader told a signals officer to inform Touler that it was time to commence the battle. The Empire had its fleet positioned above Kamino, but the Rebellion broke through its defenses and was victorious.
Touler was mentioned in Sean Williams's novel, The Force Unleashed II, which was first published in 2010.
